text: Fhe Bakɨme nduara havharar nza ndɨɨim, nza ana nzan nɨɨn za suaŋgi bigir vhuuiŋ, nza nta ndir zav ntan rarga ki. Nde ana khothɨgim, ana nden muuŋgirim, nde ndikndiga bakɨmen muuŋv, ndava mɨɨtɨk guigira nde ndavi givav kɨri. Nde Fhe Bakɨmen Ŋina Ŋaara ŋkasŋkar panan, Fhe Bakɨme nden nɨɨn za mbui bigir vhuuiŋ, nde ntan rarga ki tɨv, ana guigira nden ndavi givari.
